abstract: The hedge fund Elliott Associates, a large shareholder of Novell, said Tuesday afternoon that it was offering to buy the business software company in a deal valued at about $2 billion.
snippet: The hedge fund Elliott Associates, a large shareholder of Novell, said Tuesday afternoon that it was offering to buy the business software company in a deal valued at about $2 billion.
lead_paragraph: 10:08 p.m. | Updated The hedge fund Elliott Associates said Tuesday afternoon that it had made an offer to buy Novell in a deal that valued the business software company at about $2 billion.

headline.main: Elliott Associates Offers to Buy Novell
